mapper.select: SELECT r.REQUEST_NO , r.STATUS AS requestStatus , m.NICKNAME AS nickName , m.ADDRESS , e.START_TIME AS startTime , e.END_TIME AS endTime , rs.AVG_STAR_SCORE AS starScore , rs.REVIEW_COUNT AS reviewCount FROM TB_ESTIMATE_REQUEST r JOIN TB_EXPERT e ON e.USER_NO = r.EXPERT_NO JOIN TB_MEMBER m ON m.USER_NO = e.USER_NO LEFT JOIN ( SELECT e.USER_NO AS EXPERT_NO , ROUND(AVG(rv.STAR_SCORE), 2) AS AVG_STAR_SCORE , COUNT(rv.REVIEW_NO) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM TB_EXPERT e LEFT JOIN TB_ESTIMATE_REQUEST r2 ON r2.EXPERT_NO = e.USER_NO LEFT JOIN TB_ESTIMATE_RESPONSE er ON er.REQUEST_NO = r2.REQUEST_NO LEFT JOIN TB_REVIEW rv ON rv.ESTIMATE_NO = er.ESTIMATE_NO AND rv.STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY e.USER_NO ) rs ON rs.EXPERT_NO = r.EXPERT_NO WHERE r.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY r.REQUEST_NO DESC OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT 4 ROWS ONLY;
